title: Pixel 4a 5G - Google assistant, spotify commands go to TV not phone.
content:
When I ask my phone to "open spotify" or "play X on spotify" it will with a) do nothing or b) open up spotify on my android TV.

Is there a way I can get any commands I issue via assistant to only apply to the phone (and to get them to also actually work consistantly) sometimes it will register the command but won't actualy open spotify and start playing?!

This seemed to work just fine on the Huawei Mate 10 Pro I've moved from - annoying that a google device seems harder to get working with the google assistant!
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 4a (5G)
